name: Jixxaw: Party Time
description:
It's PARTY time and they're all waiting for you! Put the pieces together to solve the puzzle and reveal HD, realistic, naughty & sexy girls! Earn all the stars to beat record scores and unlock achievements.
Now with the Skip Level feature!
Classic jigsaw puzzle mechanics
15 challenging levels
Uncensored content
Beat the record times to earn stars
Realistic graphics
Atmospheric music
30 achievements
Display girls from the gallery
Easily skip levels - unlock girls if you can't beat a level for more than 10 mins
